attributes.action: Change the law so that ALL employees can set the cost of travel to and from work against their annual tax bill.
attributes.additional_details: Not paying for travel must be a nice thing for somebody because our dishonourable electeds would not have voted for free travel for themselves, their extended families and their taxpayer funded office help, were it not something that is nice to have.  The facility to travel to and from work, as it is in many, many countries across the planet, without having to bear the full cost MUST be extended to the working population of this country.
